DOC.brief_summary: This single dose study radiolabelled LY2940680 take mouth healthy participant study body absorbs remove LY2940680 blood . This study research purpose intend treat medical condition .
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy sterile male surgically sterile female postmenopausal female , determine medical history laboratory assessment Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 32.0 kilogram per meter square ( kg/m^2 ) , inclusive Regularly use know drug abuse and/or show positive finding urinary drug screen Have consume herbal supplement , grapefruit juice , grapefruit , grapefruit containing product , Seville orange juice , Seville oranges , star fruit , star fruit juice within 7 day prior dose intend consume study donate blood 500 milliliter ( mL ) within last month Have participate [ 14C ] study within last 6 month prior admission study Exposure significant radiation within 12 month prior dose ( example , serial Xray compute tomography scan , barium meal , current employment job require radiation exposure monitoring ) Have pattern less per 2 day expel feces bowel rectum acute constipation within 3 week day prior dose
